_header: Four manner of folks are evil to please
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of folkis evill to pleis’ — seven quatrains with refrain: ‘And wald have part fra utheris by’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Four maner of folkis ar evill to pleisane is þat riches hes
                    and eis…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Of him I will no larges cryHe ȝeid fra me till vtheris
                    by

Banna.First Lines:
ffoure mener of men ar evill to kenAne Is þat riches hes and
                    eis…
Banna.Last Lines:
…quha evir it haif it is not IIt gois fra me to vþeris
                    by
Banna.Note:
Second occurrence in MS; stanzas 1-6 (of 7) only, with refr. ‘And
                    ȝit wald haif ane vþer by’.
